title: The papists powder treason 1588, Deo trin-vni Britanniae bis ultori in memoriam classis invincibilis subversae submersae : proditionis nesandae detectae disiectae : To God, in memorye of his double deliverance from ye invincible navie and ye unmatcheable powder treason, 1605 / invented by Samuell Ward.
author: Ward, Samuel, 1577-1640.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed and sould by P. Stent, sould by Iohn Overton,
